languages.text: {n}Маражай молча переваривает слова Арлекина. Наконец на его лице появляется тень обычной ухмылки.{/n} "Я... понял тебя, Аребенниан".
{n}Marazhai digests the Harlequin's words in silence. At last, a shadow of the usual smirk flashes on his face.{/n} "I... I hear you, Arebennian."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай молча переваривает слова Арлекина. Наконец на его лице появляется тень обычной ухмылки.{/n} "Я... понял тебя, Аребенниан".

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは黙ってハーレクィンの言葉を聞いていた。最後に、彼の顔にいつもどおりの微笑みの影が浮かんだ。{/n}「その通りだな…アーベニアン」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai digests the Harlequin's words in silence. At last, a shadow of the usual smirk flashes on his face.{/n} "I... I hear you, Arebennian."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは黙ってハーレクィンの言葉を聞いていた。最後に、彼の顔にいつもどおりの微笑みの影が浮かんだ。{/n}「その通りだな…アーベニアン」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋默默地聆听着丑角的话。到了最后，他的脸上再次浮现了淡淡的笑容，似乎带着一丝得意。{/n}“我……我明白你的意思了，独角。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai digests the Harlequin's words in silence. At last, a shadow of the usual smirk flashes on his face.{/n} "I... I hear you, Arebennian."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋默默地聆听着丑角的话。到了最后，他的脸上再次浮现了淡淡的笑容，似乎带着一丝得意。{/n}“我……我明白你的意思了，独角。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai digiere en silencio las palabras del Arlequín. Finalmente, una sombra de su sonrisa habitual se dibuja en su rostro.{/n} «Te... te escucho, Arebennian».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai digests the Harlequin's words in silence. At last, a shadow of the usual smirk flashes on his face.{/n} "I... I hear you, Arebennian."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai digiere en silencio las palabras del Arlequín. Finalmente, una sombra de su sonrisa habitual se dibuja en su rostro.{/n} «Te... te escucho, Arebennian».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai verdaut die Worte des Harlekins schweigend. Schließlich legt sich ein Schatten seines üblichen Grinsens auf sein Gesicht.{/n} "Ich ... Ich höre Euch, Arebennian."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai digests the Harlequin's words in silence. At last, a shadow of the usual smirk flashes on his face.{/n} "I... I hear you, Arebennian."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai verdaut die Worte des Harlekins schweigend. Schließlich legt sich ein Schatten seines üblichen Grinsens auf sein Gesicht.{/n} "Ich ... Ich höre Euch, Arebennian."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai médite les paroles de l'Arlequin en silence. Après un long moment, il esquisse de nouveau son rictus habituel.{/n} « Je... je vous comprends, Arebennian. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai digests the Harlequin's words in silence. At last, a shadow of the usual smirk flashes on his face.{/n} "I... I hear you, Arebennian."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai médite les paroles de l'arlequin en silence. Après un long moment, il esquisse de nouveau son rictus habituel.{/n} « Je... je vous comprends, arebennian. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, Arleken'in sözlerini sessizlik içinde sindiriyor. En nihayetinde yüzüne alelade bir sırıtışın gölgesi vuruyor.{/n} "Seni... Anlıyorum Arebennian."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai digests the Harlequin's words in silence. At last, a shadow of the usual smirk flashes on his face.{/n} "I... I hear you, Arebennian."
